code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import"./CreateActivity.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateActivity=()=>{const[activity,setActivity]=useState({activity:""});const{trip_id}=useParams();const handleChange=event=>{const{name,value}=event.target;setActivity(prev=>{return{...prev,[name]:value};});};const createActivity=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(activity)};fetch("/api/activities/"+trip_id,options);window.location.href="/";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Add Activity"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Activity"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"activity",name:"activity",value:activity.activity,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Trip ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"trip_id",name:"trip_id",value:trip_id,readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Submit",onClick:createActivity})]})]});};export default CreateActivity;
